name: Grilled Wagyu Steak
description: Grilled wagyu beef steak served on bed of mashed potatoes, accompanied with carrot, baby corn, cherry tomato and red wine sauce.

name: Mixed Grilled
description: Prawns, squid, cuttle fish, clams, scallop, mussel, fish, chicken roll, beef and lemon butter sauce.

name: Herbal Chicken Soup
description: Chinese styles chicken soup with herbs and dried prunes.
